xt:extension.xt:author: Dartmouth College Library
xt:extension.xt:name: MODS (Metadata Object Description Schema)

xt:description.p: The Dartmouth College Library's local implementation of MODS, the Metadata Object Description Schema.

ul.li: Update "MODS-to-MARCXML" transformation (enhancements to map fixed fields, tests for subject authorities, support for 991).
Update record templates. Add template for Dartmouth College Films.
Update "MODS-to-Crossref" transformation to support individual books.
Add "MODS Derive Print" transformation to produce MODS record for print manifestation of resource.
Add schema support for creation/production credits note, video/mp4 internet media type, @objectPart on mods:accessCondition.
